tool.name: TimeML Events
tool.description: (standalone) Add tokens, sentences, and event annotations to unannotated text
tool.help:
**What it does**
This is the TimeML Event annotator application from GATE packaged as a single LAPPS Grid service.
**Required Annotations**
* None
**Generated Annotations**
* Token annotations in `GATE XML format <https://gate.ac.uk/sale/tao/splitch5.html#x8-1000005.5.2>`_ with part of speech from the Penn tagset given on the "category" feature. * Sentence annotations in `GATE XML format <https://gate.ac.uk/sale/tao/splitch5.html#x8-1000005.5.2>`_. * "Lookup"" annotations (generated by the GATE Gazeteer) * Event annotations in `GATE XML format <https://gate.ac.uk/sale/tao/splitch5.html#x8-1000005.5.2>`_.
.. class:: warningmark
The output of all GATE tools is in the `GATE XML format <https://gate.ac.uk/sale/tao/splitch5.html#x8-1000005.5.2>`_. This output can be input directly into other GATE tools. To input GATE XML format to tools requiring LIF, use *Convert formats->GateToLif*
